data.title: Life cycle of a rabbit
data.solution:
R = int(input()) # Number of rabbits born on day 1.
D = int(input()) # Number of days to run the simulation.
B = int(input()) # Number of babies made on the 2nd day of their live by each rabbit.

New_born = R
Adult1 = 0
Adult2 = 0
Old = 0

for day in range(1, D):
    New_born, Adult1, Adult2, Old = B * (Adult1 + Adult2), New_born, Adult1, Adult2

print(New_born + Adult1 + Adult2 + Old)
data.statement:
A rabbit lives 4 days:
- The first day, growing up.
- The second day and third day, reproducing*, making [[Babies]] babies each day.
- The last day, dying at the end of the day.

With [[Rabbit]] rabbits being born on day 1, how many rabbits will be alive on the [[Day]]-th day ?

(*Rabbits can reproduce even alone, babies are born the day after rabbits reproduce)
data.stubGenerator:
read Rabbit:int
read Day:int
read babies:int

write total
data.inputDescription:
<<Line 1:>> integer [[Rabbit]] of rabbits born on day 1.
<<Line 2:>> integer [[Day]] number of days to run the simulation.
<<Line 3:>> Integer [[Babies]] number of babies made on the 2nd and 3rd days of their lives by each rabbit. (They produce this number EACH day, not in total)
data.outputDescription:
<<Line 1:>> Integer [[Total]] Total number of rabbits alive on the [[Day]]-th day.

* include new-born, adult and old rabbits.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

A rabbit lives 4 days:
- The first day, growing up.
- The second day and third day, reproducing*, making Babies babies each day.
- The last day, dying at the end of the day.

With Rabbit rabbits being born on day 1, how many rabbits will be alive on the Day-th day ?

(*Rabbits can reproduce even alone, babies are born the day after rabbits reproduce)
Input
Line 1: integer Rabbit of rabbits born on day 1.
Line 2: integer Day number of days to run the simulation.
Line 3: Integer Babies number of babies made on the 2nd and 3rd days of their lives by each rabbit. (They produce this number EACH day, not in total)
Output
Line 1: Integer Total Total number of rabbits alive on the Day-th day.

* include new-born, adult and old rabbits.
Constraints
1 <= Rabbit <= 1000
5 <= Day <= 1000
1 <= Babies <= 100
0 <= Total <= 10^15
Example
Input
10
10
2
Output
1480
